title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: Language for Enhancing Awareness of Active Blended Learning (ABL)

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic digital learning tools and intermediate-level language learning comprehension
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the core principles of ABL (Activity-Based Learning + online/offline integration) with over 80% proficiency
Learners apply active participation strategies in language practice through twice-weekly VR-based role-playing
Learners write smartphone-based self-directed learning plans and incorporate evaluative feedback at least three times

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
